    Better Directions

    Welcome to better directions, a modern twist on the classic travling salesman. We know your time is important, so let Better Directions minimize your time in traffic so you have more time doing what you love.

    Enter up to 10 addresses and this app will find the most time efficient path for you to take. Enter new address by clicking on the gray box, and once you're dont click "Calculate Route" and let the app do its magic!

    Note: Due to query limits of the Google Maps API, requests of 6+ addresses may experience 1-2 min slowdown.
